# MathJax 3.2.2 Commands Reference

## Greek Letters
**Lowercase:** \\alpha, \\beta, \\gamma, \\delta, \\epsilon, \\zeta, \\eta, \\theta, \\iota, \\kappa, \\lambda, \\mu, \\nu, \\xi, \\pi, \\rho, \\sigma, \\tau, \\upsilon, \\phi, \\chi, \\psi, \\omega

**Uppercase:** \\Gamma, \\Delta, \\Theta, \\Lambda, \\Xi, \\Pi, \\Sigma, \\Upsilon, \\Phi, \\Psi, \\Omega

## Binary Operators
\\pm, \\mp, \\times, \\div, \\cdot, \\ast, \\star, \\circ, \\bullet, \\cap, \\cup, \\vee, \\wedge, \\oplus, \\ominus, \\otimes

## Relations
\\leq, \\geq, \\equiv, \\sim, \\approx, \\cong, \\neq, \\in, \\notin, \\subset, \\supset

## Arrows
\\leftarrow, \\rightarrow, \\leftrightarrow, \\Leftarrow, \\Rightarrow, \\Leftrightarrow, \\uparrow, \\downarrow

## Functions
\\sin, \\cos, \\tan, \\log, \\ln, \\exp, \\lim, \\min, \\max, \\det

## Large Operators
\\sum, \\prod, \\int, \\oint, \\iint, \\iiint, \\bigcap, \\bigcup

## Delimiters
\\langle, \\rangle, \\lfloor, \\rfloor, \\lceil, \\rceil

## Symbols
\\infty, \\partial, \\nabla, \\hbar, \\ell, \\forall, \\exists, \\emptyset

## Accents
\\hat{x}, \\tilde{x}, \\bar{x}, \\vec{x}, \\dot{x}, \\ddot{x}

## Font Commands
\\mathrm{text}, \\mathbf{text}, \\mathbb{R}, \\mathcal{A}, \\mathfrak{A}, \\text{text}

## Fractions & Roots
\\frac{a}{b}, \\dfrac{a}{b}, \\sqrt{x}, \\sqrt[n]{x}, \\binom{n}{k}

## Matrices
\\begin{matrix}...\\end{matrix}
\\begin{pmatrix}...\\end{pmatrix}
\\begin{bmatrix}...\\end{bmatrix}
\\begin{cases}...\\end{cases}

## Physics Extension (use $\\require{physics}$)

### Matrices
\\mqty{a & b \\\\ c & d} - no brackets
\\mqty(a & b \\\\ c & d) - parentheses
\\mqty[a & b \\\\ c & d] - square brackets
\\imat{n} - identity matrix
\\dmat{a,b,c} - diagonal matrix

### Vectors
\\va{v}, \\vb{v}, \\vu{v}

### Derivatives
\\dv{f}{x}, \\pdv{f}{x}, \\dd{x}

### Quantum
\\bra{a}, \\ket{b}, \\braket{a}{b}, \\ketbra{a}{b}

### Brackets
\\abs{x}, \\norm{x}, \\eval{f}_a^b

### Operators
\\grad, \\div, \\curl, \\tr
